page.title: 14THE VILLAGE HALL
page.content: The{village school}does not have sufficient space to present{school {plays and concerts.}The Lambeague Hall, with its stage, changing room and seating capacity, provides ideally for the needs of the children, and in recent years the{school Christmas {concert or nativity play}has been presented there. Another annual function which takes place in the hall is the{Senior {Citizens' Christmas Dinner.}The members of the committee organising this event suitably decorate the hall, prepare the food and provide entertainment for the afternoon for all the pensionable residents of the area. Occasionally the children from Coverack School are invited to provide the entertainment for this very worthwhile and much appreciated event.
